description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=3/3. A new awesome ZOMBIE Game! A real one! Try this new masterpiece from Monkeyware Studios! - Full 16bit Retro-Enhanced Graphics - Levels with Humor - Uniques Boss Fight! - Tons of ZOMBIE!  These features are waiting for you in full game version!
